Texts.Chs: 人工智能不允许存在于这个星球，但是我现在研究的项目非常需要一个^orange;智能芯片^white;，^green;你可以带一个给我吗？我会好好报答你的^reset;。
Texts.Eng: AI is expressly forbidden on my homeworld. But I need an ^orange;AI Chip^white; for my research! ^green;Can you please bring me one? I would reward you nicely^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 把^orange;智能芯片^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the AI Chip to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Thanks. I've transferred payment for your troubles directly to your account.
